title: Guide to Plant Fiber Cordage
summaries: The Guide to Plant Fiber Cordage is an accessory that, when equipped, allows the player to collect Vine Rope when destroying vines. It can be found inside surface Chests or in Wooden Crates and Pearlwood Crates obtained from fishing. It can also be purchased at the Skeleton Merchant for 2 GC50 SC during First Quarter.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the collection of Vine Rope from vines
statistics.Buy: 2 GC50 SC
statistics.Sell: 50 SC
